83467.summary: Some customers in the Transcona South and Mission Gardens area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
83467.title: Sept 30 - Winnipeg (Transcona South & Mission Gardens) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
